name: Farmhouse Barbecue Muffins
author: Donna Menz
instructions: Separate biscuits and press each into the bottom and up the sides of greased muffin cups; set aside. Brown the ground beef; drain. In a small bowl, mix ketchup, brown sugar, vinegar and chili powder; stir until smooth. Add to meat and mix well. Divide the meat mixture among the biscuit cups using about a 1/4 cup in each. Top with cheese. Bake at 375Â° for 18 to 20 minutes.
